Barangay Extend is an app which focus is to simplify the lifestyle and daily task that can be useful for both councils, employees and residents.
 Residents can see directories with information about a wide range of services, important news that is relevant to residents such as council events, road closures, extreme weather warnings, school closures, traffic incidents, and reporting problems by uploading images including GPS Location information.
